definition: to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next

sentences.english: Newcomers include Japanese knotweed and Amur bush honeysuckle.
sentences.chinese: 外来物种包括日本紫菀和灌木忍冬。

sentences.english: But scholars in the past neglected the foreign cultural factors when plot of a novel was conceived.
sentences.chinese: 而前贤忽视了这一有关构思根本的外来文化因子触媒。

sentences.english: Lleras based his theory on the idea that our senses become used to stimulus.
sentences.chinese: 雷若斯的理论是以我们感官会习惯的外来刺激为根据。

sentences.english: While meeting financial group influence in foreign hotel to press on to the border, is because"wolf" come.
sentences.chinese: 在遇到外来饭店财团势力压境时，是因为“狼”来了。

sentences.english: Conclusions The non-natives are the major component of TB patients in Shenzhen.
sentences.chinese: 结论外来人口是深圳市结核病疫情的主要组成部分。

sentences.english: And then the lake itself is like a plate which spreads before the eyes of the outlooker.
sentences.chinese: 在外来者眼前，西湖看起来就像是一个平放着的圆盘。

sentences.english: Third, make non-native population participate in all-people body-building activities.
sentences.chinese: 三是针对外来人口全民健身活动。

sentences.english: The foreign team upset the local team.
sentences.chinese: 这个外来队竟把地方队给颠覆了。

sentences.english: A great scholar and poet, Wen Yiduo was brave in absorbing all exotic nutrition beneficial to his pursuit of poetic art.
sentences.chinese: 闻一多在诗艺追求中勇于汲纳一切有益的外来营养。

sentences.english: the eggs are collected before they divide and are injected with the foreign genetic material.
sentences.chinese: 将这些卵收集起来，在其卵裂前注入外来基因物质。

sentences.english: Any foreign agent or organism that is harmful to the body.
sentences.chinese: 任何对身体有害的外来物或生物。

sentences.english: The scope and definition of loanwords in Chinese language has been long discussed.
sentences.chinese: 在汉语外来词的范围及定义方面久存争论。

sentences.english: Our cells don't like foreign bodies.
sentences.chinese: 我们的细胞不喜欢外来物。

sentences.english: Monosyllabic loanwords constitute only a small proportion of the Chinese loanwords.
sentences.chinese: 汉语借词中，单音节外来词只占一小部分。

sentences.english: One of the conspicuous phenomenons of it is full of a lot of English words.
sentences.chinese: 网络语言中一个突出现象是大量英语外来词杂糅其中。

sentences.english: It's probably alien to your experience.
sentences.chinese: 它大概对你的经历来说是外来物。

definition: to reject/to exclude/to eliminate/to remove/to repel
to make (military) incursions/to invade/to intrude into/to trespass/to gain unauthorized access (computing)
to take in/to absorb/to admit/to accept
